contents.text: Welcome to Liftopia in San Francisco, the world's largest online marketplace for ski lift tickets.
For lift ticket bookings and pricing information, press 1.
To search for lift tickets by mountain or resort, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our booking specialists for mountain search. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: Compare lift ticket availability and pricing for Mammoth Mountain next weekend
Find weekend lift ticket prices at Mammoth Mountain and check if veteran discounts are available.
Search for available lift tickets at Mammoth Mountain on March 20 with dynamic pricing details.
I want to book ski lift tickets for Squaw Valley on January 10th.
Find availability and pricing for lift tickets at a specific ski resort next weekend.

contents.text: To modify or cancel an existing booking, press 2.
One moment please. We're transferring you to our team for booking modifications or cancellations.

navigationGoals: Change the date on my existing Vail lift ticket reservation
Modify my existing Heavenly Resort booking to a later date because my military commitment schedule changed.
Modify my existing Mammoth Mountain lift ticket from March 20 to March 22 and confirm any prorated charges.
I need to change the date on my existing lift ticket from Jan 10 to Jan 12.
Change the date on my existing lift ticket reservation to a new date.

contents.text: For customer service and support, press 2.
To inquire about payment issues or refunds, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our payment and refunds department.

navigationGoals: Investigate and request a refund for an incorrect charge on my last booking
Resolve a double charge on my Squaw Valley lift ticket purchase and request a refund.
Check the refund status for a double charge on my credit card and provide the transaction reference.
I was charged twice for my lift tickets and need a refund.
Request a refund for my canceled lift tickets due to weather.

contents.text: For technical support with our website or account, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: Resolve the login error preventing me from accessing my Liftopia account
Fix my account login after resetting my password so I can manage my bookings.
Troubleshoot the OAuth two-factor authentication error on the Liftopia website preventing me from logging in.
I can’t log into my account because I’ve forgotten my password.
Get help resetting my account password so I can log in.
